code-exchange.name: CodeExchange
code-exchange.description: Get started with code samples for common Twilio use cases.

basic-sms-autoresponse.name: Basic SMS Auto-Response
basic-sms-autoresponse.description: A basic Twilio Messaging TwiML template Function that will return TwiML to message "Hello World"

basic-voice-autoresponse.name: Basic Call Auto-Response
basic-voice-autoresponse.description: A basic Twilio Messaging TwiML template Function that will return TwiML to say "Hello World"

virtual-medical-visits.name: Virtual Medical Visits
virtual-medical-visits.description: A telemedicine app that will enable video 1:1s, as well as guidance to build screen annotation during calls and send appointment reminders.

virtual-classroom.name: Virtual Classroom
virtual-classroom.description: Build an app to enable robust virtual classroom time between teachers and students.

flex-auto-responses.name: Auto-Responses
flex-auto-responses.description: Enable auto response for your agents and enable them to use canned responses in your Flex call center.

sms-support-chatbot.name: SMS Support Chatbot using Autopilot
sms-support-chatbot.description: Uses AI to interpret a user's incoming texts, and responds accordingly with the correct support.

sms-notifications.name: SMS Notifications
sms-notifications.description: Automate a workflow through an example that mimics a vacation rental website where a host can notify guests of a reservation via text message.

connect-volunteers.name: Connect Volunteers through SMS
connect-volunteers.description: Application built to connect volunteers during COVID-19 through SMS & WhatsApp Bot.

code-exchange-covid.name: CodeExchange COVID-19 Response Samples
code-exchange-covid.description: Get started with code samples for common Twilio & COVID-19 use cases.

sourdio.name: IoT Monitoring for Sourdough Starter
sourdio.description: Uses Twilio's Narrowband IoT Developer Kit to provide data monitoring of your sourdough starter's temperature, humidity, and rise.

code-exchange-video.name: CodeExchange Video Samples
code-exchange-video.description: Get started with code samples for common Twilio Video use cases.

code-exchange-flex.name: CodeExchange Flex Samples
code-exchange-flex.description: Get started with code samples for common Twilio Flex use cases.

ai-chatbot.name: Informational AI Chatbot
ai-chatbot.description: Chatbot that uses Autopilot AI to provide custom information to users about COVID-19 pandemic. Customize based on data relevant to your users.

contactless-payment.name: Contactless Mobile Payment SMS via Stripe
contactless-payment.description: Send payment links to people via SMS using Stripe

appointment-reminders.name: Appointment Reminders via SMS
appointment-reminders.description: Remind your customers of upcoming appointments using text messages

whatsapp-sessions.name: WhatsApp Bot with Session Management & Group Messages
whatsapp-sessions.description: Maintain state in WhatsApp bot conversations and relay messages from others

video-collab-education.name: Virtual Collaboration and Education
video-collab-education.description: Web application that shares content from a host's computer to one or more remote users over the internet. Includes whiteboarding, screen sharing, chat, and annotation.

video-collab.name: Video Collaboration
video-collab.description: Build and deploy a video collaboration app in minutes on the web, iOS, and Android

customer-auth-plugin.name: Customer Authentication Flex Plugin
customer-auth-plugin.description: Use this Flex plugin so agents can authenticate customers with SMS one-time passcodes.

agent-notes-plugin.name: Agent Notes Flex Plugin
agent-notes-plugin.description: Use this Flex plugin to enable your agents to take notes when they are on-call or chatting with a customer.

voice-ivr.name: Basic IVR
voice-ivr.description: An app that sets up a basic IVR (phone tree) that gives callers information based on the options they choose.

code-exchange-email.name: CodeExchange Email Samples
code-exchange-email.description: Get started with code samples for common Twilio SendGrid Email use cases.

code-exchange-msg.name: CodeExchange Messaging Samples
code-exchange-msg.description: Get started with code samples for common Programmable Messaging use cases.

omnichannel-notifications.name: Omnichannel Notifications
omnichannel-notifications.description: Enable users to select notification preference (Email or SMS), and notify them accordingly

email-verification.name: One-click Email Verification with "Magic Links"
email-verification.description: This app will show you an example of how to build one-click email verification using the Twilio Verify API and Twilio SendGrid API.

anonymous-conversations.name: Anonymous SMS Conversation
anonymous-conversations.description: Enable parties to send text messages to each other anonymously without sharing their personal number.

twiliomatic.name: Twiliomatic
twiliomatic.description: We also hid Twiliomatic in a secret 'cheatmode' inside the SIGNAL Developer Mode. Can you find it?

pay-over-phone.name: Process Payments via Phone Call
pay-over-phone.description: Enable a caller to make a secure purchase during a voice call even when in public, using phone-based entry to input sensitive data.

sms-phone-verification.name: SMS Phone Verification
sms-phone-verification.description: Basic SMS phone verification (2FA) example using Twilio Verify
